## isPromise() function

检查值value是否是Promise对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isPromise<T = any>(value: unknown): value is Promise<T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | 要检查的值 |

**Returns:**

value is Promise&lt;T&gt;

如果value等于Promise类型,那么返回true,否则返回false
